task.title: How to Share your Screen in Zoom Using the Basic Options
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about sharing your screen in Zoom.

step.cmd: Click on the Share Screen icon.
A window opens with the different window screens (whiteboard, screen from iPhone/iPad, and the screens that are opened in your computer) you can share.
Choose the screen you want to share, then hit Share.

taskbody.result: You share your screen and provide a visual aid for your presentation. While sharing, a sign appears at the top center of your screen, indicating that you are sharing.
